title: CafePress Island Hoppers T Shirt Tri-Blend Tee
features: Machine wash cold with like colors, inside/out, then tumble dry low

ULTRA-SOFT COMFORT: Our Men's Deluxe T-Shirt will be the softest, most comfortable shirt in your dresser drawer. Semi-fitted, stretchy and breathable, this is a shirt you will wear time and time again.

AN EVERYDAY ESSENTIAL: Expressing your passions, personality and humor has never felt so good! This shirt is so soft you'll want to wear it all day, every day. Made of 4.2 oz. 100% ultra-fine combed ringspun jersey, our classic tees feature a slim, fitted cut. Size up for a looser fit.
PROFESSIONALLY PRINTED: Expertly printed with sharp, vivid designs, our tees are designed to show off your personality, passions, and humor. Imported for final manufacture locally.

MADE TO LAST: Our graphic T-shirts will make a statement everywhere you go. Special features include wicking properties for breathability and keeping cool, a double-needle sleeve and hem for durability, and a tear-away label for comfort. Shoulder-to-shoulder tape and a seamed collar help the T-shirt keep its shape. Easily machine wash cold with like colors, inside/out, then tumble dry low. Choose from several colors.

IDEAL FOR YOURSELF & A UNIQUE GIFT: Surprise your husband, brother, dad, grandpa, son, uncle, or friend, or order one just for you! Our classic T-shirts make a unique and thoughtful gift for Christmas, Father's Day, and birthdays, or just because!
description: CafePress brings your passions to life with the perfect item for every occasion. With thousands of designs to choose from, you are certain to find the unique item you've been seeking. This tri-blend short-sleeve t-shirt features a comfortable crew neck and quality construction, making it the perfect graphic tee gift. The soft fabric looks as good as it feels, and this tee is durable for everyday wear. Our cute, funny, and unique designs are printed professionally, and make great novelty gifts for him or her, young or old. And with CafePress, your satisfaction is always our promise...buy with confidence, as we offer easy returns and exchanges.
